transcript:
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Haan. Hello, haan ji sir, Ultra Power se baat kar rahe hain?
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Sir, good evening. Main Rishu baat kar rahi hun IndiaMART se.
Customer: Haan, bolo.
Executive: Ji, sir, main aapse ek request karna chah rahi hun.
Executive: Dekhiye sir, hamari baat ho gayi hai. Aapne jo ek call feedback diya tha na Anurag ki call pe, us pe hamare paas ek feedback open ho jata hai sir. Agar dekho sir, aapko baat nahi karni hai ya cheezein matlab to woh main aapka feedback close kar sakti hun sir. Kyunki sir dekho, main aapko maximum resolution de chuki hun. Ab main aapse koshish bhi yeh kar rahi hun, aapse request hai main buylead aapko khud bhejungi sir. Aap buylead use karke toh dekho.
Customer: Meri baat suniye, meri baat suniye, mere ko kuch nahi karna hai. Aapne help kiya uske liye dhanyavaad. Mujhe bas khali ek hi cheez chahiye, jo agar woh possible hai toh uske alawa mere ko koi help nahi chahiye.
Executive: Sir dekho, refund toh possible nahi hai sir. Wohi toh cheez main aapko batane ki koshish kar rahi hun.
Customer: Madam, possible sab hai, baki hota nahi hai. Kyunki agar aap ek supplier ko dete ho toh dusre mein kya problem hai?
Executive: Dekhiye refund ka sir aap, aap yeh bhi toh sochiye na, already aap paanch saal purane member hain hamare. Aur jo last renewal kiya hai, usko bhi samay ho chuka hai na sir. Abhi main aapko.
Customer: Paanch saal ho ya 50 saal ho, agar customer ko mere ko aapki service mein interest nahi hai, toh usme kya kar sakte hain boliye?
Executive: Sir, baat aapki thik hai, but abhi sir refund cheezein nahi apply ho sakti na. Isi liye main aapko bol rahi hun, jitna samay bacha hai sir, usme aap service use kar lo sir.
Customer: Mere ko nahi karna hai madam, mere ko.
Executive: Accha service nahi karna chahte?
Customer: Mere ko, mere ko hai na khali bas paisa refund chahiye.
Executive: Sir, paisa refund nahi ho sakta hai. Woh possible nahi hai sir. Yeh main aapko matlab.
Executive: Sir, phir main matlab mere ko sir yeh jo aapne feedback ka closer kiya tha sir, yeh mere ko close karna rahega sir. Main isko close kar rahi hun sir feedback ko. Baki aapko kuch issue rehta hai toh aap mere ko same number pe.
Customer: Kyun close karna hai madam? Kyun close kyun kar rahe ho?
Executive: Sir dekhiye sir refund nahi ho sakta hai na sir. Aap samjhiye. Jo cheez, jo cheez aap concern mein bol rahe ho sir, wohi hum nahi matlab provide kar sakte hain na sir aapko. Matlab refund toh nahi ho sakta. Baki aap agar service vgera ko use karne mein ya product add karane mein aapko help chahiye.
Customer: Kitna, mera, mujhe kitna time mera pending hai?
Executive: Main bata deti hun sir.
(silence)
Executive: Ji sir.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Bolo sir, bolo.
Customer: Baat khatam ho gaya.
Executive: Sir aapne do, teen saal ka wala payment kiya tha na sir? Aapne October 23 mein payment kiya tha, thik hai?
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Toh aapka abhi hamare paas jo service valid hai, woh October tak ka valid hai sir, hai na? Toh haan ji. Toh woh us samay tak bhi sir aap matlab service ko use kar lo sir.
Customer: October 26 tak ka hai na? Toh isme mere paas ek solution mere ko abhi mere dimag mein aaya hai. Mera kya hai abhi hum log chalu kiye dhire dhire export ka.
Executive: Ji.
Customer: Mujhe yeh jo hai na package convert karke de do aap export mein.
Executive: Sir, main convert kar sakti hun aapka package lekin sir usme ek cheez rahega. Jo export ka package hai uska prices hai woh different price hai matlab Indian plan se. Toh usme main aapka bacha hua paisa adjust kar dungi export mein but remaining amount aapko pay karna rahega sir. Aap export kar sakte hain.
Customer: Aap aap samjho aap ek suggestion main leke aaya usme bhi aapko advance extra paisa do toh mere ko sab mera dimag hi nahi kam karega.
Executive: Sir main dekho choice aapki sir main yeh aapke kam kara sakti hun. Aap agar export mein convert karna chahe toh yeh main bilkul kara dungi aapka lekin sir dekho export service toh aapko bhi pata hai sir unka price alag hota hai Indian price ka plan alag hota hai. Toh usme jo bhi matlab hamare paas different amount aayega na.
Customer: Jitna, jitna mera valid hai waha tak ka karo na aap jo mera remaining hai. Main extra kyun karna hai madam? Extra main karunga toh madam main hi dekhunga na. Fir mere ko dhandha nahi milega fir se mera hi guilty feel hoga na ki maine itna paisa kyun dala fir se.
Executive: Sir export mein aapko, ek minute main bata deti hun sir agar export mein aapko business mil sakta hai toh woh bhi main bata deti hun ki lead vgera available hai ya nahi hai aapke product ki. Sir same product rahega aapka export mein.
Customer: Hmm, hmm.
Executive: Ek minute. Aur ISC code vgera available hai sir apne paas? Haan ji hai, haan ji, ji.
Executive: Ek minute. Kyunki sir woh phir se same problem ho woh toh hum bhi nahi chahenge sir aap matlab obviously.
Executive: Sir dekho matlab on an average agar main baat karti hun.
Executive: Sir mainly jo product hai aapka yeh matlab VFD, DC power supply, rotatory yeh yeh sare hai na sir?
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Sir dekho agar main har product category mein baat karu toh matlab 200 plus inquiry generate ho rahi hai aur available lead mein na aap ek kam kar sakte ho sir. Matlab main main yeh bhi chahti hun ki aap bhi check kar lo. Ek baar na jab aap apna control panel login karoge sir, waha pe na ek export section hota hai buylead mein jaake, thik hai? Toh aap apne matlab us pe jana export section pe aur waha pe na kuch filters aur available buylead hoti hai aapke product ke related. Agar aapko lag raha hai sir ki woh sufficient aur aapke relevant buyleads hai sir toh phir aap matlab package ko le sakte hain aur agar aapko lagta hai ki matlab nahi hai sir toh woh phir kyunki wahi pe sari lead available rehti hai sir. Aapko waha pe country ka filter laga ke bhi dekh sakte hain aur aap recent buylead pe jaake bhi dekh sakte hain ki aapke export mein kya kya buylead generate ho rahi hai, kitni buylead generate ho rahi hai woh sari aapko dikh jayengi sir.
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Executive: Toh aap ek baar waha pe dekh lo sir. Waise lead hai sir matlab har din mein main dekh rahi hun do se teen lead generate ho rahi hai but main yeh bhi chahti hun ki aap bhi dekh le sir ek baar ki matlab waha pe aapko aur sir dekho export mein toh aap bhi jaan rahe ho agar aapko matlab do se teen acche order bhi mil gaye toh sir aapka jo return of investment hai woh aaram se nikal jayega but phir bhi main chahungi ki aap ek baar matlab go through kar le isko ki leads vgera.
Customer: Nahi main toh woh toh maine check kiya hua hai humne already. Mere liye toh woh sab kam ka hai.
Executive: Ji.
Customer: Bolo.
Executive: Sir main ek baar phir ek kam karti hun na sir. Main aapko final matlab jo bhi ho sakta hai ya aapka kitna adjustment ban raha hai uske hisab se main aapko price bata deti hun. Ek saal ka sir dekho minimum package ek saal ka hai hamara jo starter packaging hai. Usse aapko 10 buylead hafte ki milenge usme matlab package ke hisab se 10 buylead hafte ki rahengi. Toh woh starting package hai ek saal ka. Toh minimum package wohi hamare paas hai. Agar aap usme chahenge toh usme main aapka paisa adjust kar dungi sir aur remaining wala amount aap pay kar dena phir aapki Indian service band ho jayegi aur export chalti rahegi sir.
Customer: Remaining kyun karna hai? Usi mein adjust kar do na jitna ho raha hai utna.
Executive: Sir aise nahi ho sakta na. Minimum ek saal ka deal amount phir calculate hoga tabhi toh deal activate hogi na sir.
Executive: Agar sir minimum one year ka amount clear nahi karungi toh phir deal kaise activate hoga? Woh hoga hi nahi sir.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Woh system hi nahi leta. Matlab yahi wohi hai phir se wohi hai na. Ghuma fira ke baat toh wohi pe ja rahi hai madam.
Executive: Sir dekho aapne mujhe bola sir aapne mujhe bola maine aapko bataya.
Customer: Nahi nahi woh aapka baat aapne bataya matlab wohi baat toh wohi hua na madam. Ghuma fira ke baat toh wohi pe ja rahi hai madam.
Executive: Sir export maine khud se aapko initiate bhi nahi kiya sir. Main toh aapko.
Customer: Nahi nahi woh toh madam main wohi bol raha hun ki maine hi manga export ka but aapka kam hai usko adjust karke dena ke nahi ki extra paisa loge toh phir meri bewakoof hua na madam ki phir se paisa dal do.
Executive: Sir extra paisa nahi hai aap apna deal convert karwa rahe ho. Sir ek baat batao for an example main hun main koi service main apne ghar pe wifi use kar rahi hun aur woh wifi ki speed cheeze mujhe achi nahi lag rahi aur maine apna plan convert kara aur toh uske liye agar mujhe koi additional paisa de raha hai toh mere liye toh woh sir achi deal hai na isme mera kya main matlab isme pagal ya aise banne wali koi baat nahi hai.
Customer: Madam aise meri baat suniye aap jabhi jo example diya na uske example se aap jodoge na ki bhai aapko agar woh jo currently package hai usme agar aapko service nahi mil rahi thik se toh usme paisa refund bhi ho jata hai. Chahe woh yaha pe hamare yaha pe GTPL ka network chal raha hai, switch ka chal raha hai, Jio ka chal raha hai.
Executive: Jio wale toh nahi dete hain sir.
Customer: Madam main apna khud ka experience share kar raha hun.
Executive: Sir mere ghar pe bhi void lagaya woh toh nahi dete hain refund sir. Even prepaid ko postpaid convert karwa diya sir unhone.
Customer: Oh Kiran bhai.
[Gujarati speech]
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer wants a refund for the subscription.

- Customer is not interested in the service.



Resolution:

- Executive explained refund is not possible.

- Executive offered to convert the plan to export.

- Executive explained the export plan details.

- Executive suggested checking export buyleads.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will provide final price with adjustments.



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- refund, export, subscription, buyleads
